summary: All 30 integration items completed across 3 rounds - fully interconnected packages
details: Round 1: Learning-guided routing, budget-aware key rotation, atomic stats. Round 2: Config loader, errors, logger, validator, dashboard health, model sync. Round 3: Circuit breaker feedback, key rotation failures, budget exhaustion feedback.
